title: No changes requested (payment method confirmed)
constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all Motoko logic in the single main actor (backend/main.mo). Only add migration.mo if state upgrades are required.
nonGoals: Do not add new features or modify existing checkout/payment behavior since the user confirmed it works as expected.
Do not redesign UI or change visual theme unless explicitly requested.
